entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:51AM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Etowah County through 530 AM CDT... At 451 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Sardis City to near Walnut Grove. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued April 01 at 4:44AM CDT by NWS
